akn:section.akn:heading: Support for international election observation and democratic civil society

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary of State, in coordination with the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Engagement at the Organization of American States

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Engagement at the Organization of American States The Secretary of State, acting through the United States Permanent Representative to the Organization of American States, should advocate and build diplomatic support for sending an election observation mission to Venezuela to ensure that democratic electoral processes are organized and carried out in a free, fair, and transparent manner.

(c) Briefing requirement Not later than 180 days after December 20, 2019, the Secretary of State, in coordination with the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, shall provide a briefing on the strategy to carry out the activities described in subsection (a) to—
